import { useRef } from 'react' import '../styles/stories.css' export default function Stories() { // Draw effect draw circle when hover const canvasRef = useRef(null) const imgRef = useRef(null) const draw = (e) => { const canvas = canvasRef.current const img = imgRef.current const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d') const x = e.clientX - canvas.offsetLeft const y = e.clientY - canvas.offsetTop ctx.beginPath() ctx.arc(x, y, 50, 0, 2 * Math.PI) ctx.stroke() ctx.drawImage(img, x - 50, y - 50, 100, 100) } return (
  • add
